Award.AwardTitle: Travel Support for ACM SIGCOMM Conference 2003; Karlsruhe, Germany; August 25-29

Directorate.LongName: Direct For Computer & Info Scie & Enginr

Division.LongName: Division Of Computer and Network Systems

Award.AbstractNarration: The 2003 ACM SIGCOMM Conference on Communications Architectures, Protocols and Applications will be held in Karlruhe, Germany, from August 25-August 29, 2003. This conference is the premier technical meeting that examines the state-of-the-art in computer networks and communications. This proposal requests funding to assist approximately 15 United States-based graduate students in attending this meeting. Participation in conferences such as SIGCOMM is an extremely important part of the graduate school experience, providing the opportunity to interact with more senior researchers and to be exposed to leading edge work in the field. The support requested in this propoal will enable the participation of students who would otherwise be unable to attend ACM SIGCOMM 2003.
